resources.string: I really want to loose weight
I\'m losing weight and it feels great!
I have reached my target weight and I\'m not sure what to do next
I have kept my weight off for years now, I\'m awesome
How much weight did you loose?
How long did it take you to loose that much?
For how long have you maintained your current weight
Can you briefly describe, the methods you used to loose weight? Like your workout routine, the food groups you have been eating?
Do you experience the effects of weight loss eg thinking of food all the time
What recommendations do you have for someone wanting to loose weight or already in the journey?
Yes, I allow you to use this information for analysis anonymously
This is my first real app :), I appreciate your feedback.
